<title level="1" right="Hazard 5" pfs="">[Fireball Rune](/Hazards.aspx?ID=7)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 524 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

An invisible rune creates an invisible, spherical magical sensor with a 20-foot radius.

---

**Stealth**
DC 24 (expert)

**Disable**
[Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) DC 22 (expert) to erase the rune without triggering the sensor, or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (3rd level; counteract DC 20) to counteract the rune

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Fireball** <actions string="Reaction" /> (arcane, evocation, fire); **Trigger** A living creature enters the sensor area. **Effect** The rune detonates a fireball centered on the triggering creature’s square. This is a 3rd-level [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) spell that deals 6d6 fire damage (DC 22 basic Reflex save).
